long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is packed with features and UI changes to improve the user experience while using the LUMS Zambeel portal and LMS. Some of these include calculated means of everyone who has Zambeel+ installed, estimated grade cutoffs, dark theme, and a nicer user interface to stare at while you stare at disaster during enrollment! You can now also download all the files on the LMS resource tab in one click.

Please note that this extension will send your marks to be stored in a database for functionality, but your roll number will not be stored.
